CardWeights_README: CardWeights are checked when adding cards and used on card draw. Values should be between 0.01 and 1. Values are checked on startup.
CardOptionCount_README: CardOptionCount is checked on Setup and is *required*. All cards added will require this many options
CardStats_README: CardStats is checked on Setup and is *required*. You can have as many Stats (eg, Health, Money etc) as you like however each *must* have Starting,Minimum and Maximum. (These should be ints!) Any Cards added will require these stats
